title: stuck, A Gangsta&rsquo;s Matrix by freddy scurry
description:
PROLOGUE 
 
      
 
           For  the  last  few  years, this  life  IÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve  been  
living  has  been  a  constant   trial  after  trial. It  
seems  as  if  every time  I  get  past  one  obstacle, IÃ¢â‚¬â„¢m  
right  back  in  the  mist  of  another. I  guess  you

During  the  mist  of  my  quest  I  was  
introduced  to  so  much  negativity, that  eventually, I  
was  pushed  in  the  vicious  hands  of  BabylonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s
